title: Prohibits real estate brokers from providing legal advice or preparing legal documents in real estate matters unless such person is a New York state licensed attorney
summary: Prohibits real estate brokers from providing legal advice or preparing legal documents in real estate matters unless such person is a New York state licensed attorney; warning for first offense, $1,000 fine for second offense, $5,000 fine for each subsequent offense.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to prohibiting real estate brokers from providing legal advice or preparing legal documents in real estate matters unless such person is a New York state licensed attorney
